content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 cup dates, pitted and chopped" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "400 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "200 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease and flour a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
2) In a large bowl, combine dates, brown sugar, margarine and boiling water.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "dates"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "brown sugar"@35:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "margarine"@48:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "boiling water"@62:75 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in flour, soda and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "soda"@18:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "vanilla"@27:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "the preheated oven"@11:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "45 minutes"@34:44 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
